hi

Ok, you can download another torrent for this but I don't think PirateBay will let me include the link. Let's try this again:

If you are looking for a crack for the language pack activation, I found one on PickTorrent called Rosetta Stone v3.4.5 Crack Only -- if you put those terms into Google it should work.

THIS IS ONLY THE CRACK, you need to download and install Rosetta Stone v3.4.5 first from a separate torrent.

The Readme is fairly vague (for Mac especially), so here's what to do. I only have a Mac so I can't help you Windows folk, but it's probably the file in like Program Files > Rosetta Stone folder. Don't worry, it worked for me after I had updated Rosetta and ran it once to discover the 'language locked' problem.

IF YOU HAVE OSX Lion:
Open the folder called Mac in the torrent, control+click (or right click) and select "Copy mdm.dat"
Open Finder, click on Applications Folder
Scroll to Rosetta Stone V3
Control+Click (or right click) and go to Show Package Contents
Click the Contents folder
Resources Folder
control+click on a blank spot in that folder, click "paste item"

When it asks to replace or keep both, say replace.

Open Rosetta Stone and it should not be asking for any language activation. Voila! Enjoy. :)
